label: 勅撰集
対訳語: anthology of Japanese verse compiled at imperial command
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: An anthology of Japanese verse (wakashū) compiled at the request of the Sovereign (Tennō). Key- wakashū. Refer- 1. Kokinshū or Kokin-wakashū, 2. Gosen-wakashū, 3. Shūi-wakashū, 4. Goshūi-wakashū, 5. Kin'yō-wakashū, 6. Shika-wakashū. [和歌集、天皇、古今集、古今和歌集、後選和歌集、拾遺和歌集、後拾遺和歌集、金葉和歌集、詞花和歌集]
